articles.author: Wilson Wong
articles.title: Video shows stranger attacking Asian woman with hammer in NYC - NBC News
articles.description: An Asian woman in New York City suffered a laceration to the head after she was attacked with a hammer by a stranger who demanded her to remove her mask, police said.
articles.content:
An Asian woman in New York City was attacked in the head with a hammer by a stranger who demanded the victim remove her mask, police said Monday.

articles.title: MAG says no Malaysia Airlines, AirAsia merger plan - The Star Online
articles.description: Malaysia Aviation Group (MAG), the parent company of Malaysia Airlines Bhd, has put an end to the rumours surrounding the possible merger between the airline and low cost carrier AirAsia Group Bhd.

articles.title: Olympics: Swimmer calls for expulsion of junta-led Myanmar from Games - CNA
articles.description: MELBOURNE: A leading Myanmar swimmer has called for an international boycott of his country's Olympic committee, branding it a "puppet" of the southeast Asian nation's military rulers.
